website_summaries.verdict: This durable plug adapter comes with a built-in spare fuse and a lifetime guarantee, so it'll last you for years to come.
pros: Built-in spare fuse that you can replace if need be
Lightweight and easy to pack in your suitcase
cons: The slider knobs that push out the adapter plugs can be difficult to move

customer_reviews.title: Worked well in the UK
customer_reviews.text: We took it to the UK with us for two weeks. A good feature is that it lights up with an unobtrusive blue glow when it receives power. Turns out that one can plug into the wall but not be getting power. When this is the case, look for a rocker switch close by. It will give power to the outlet. When you put the rocker switch in the correct position, the unit will light up and you can be assure power will be available.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for a trip to the UK. It is a little bigger than it looks in the picture but that is fine because it feels substantial. I really like the way the prongs slide out and it is so well labeled so you know which ones you have.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance for the Last Month
customer_reviews.text: I used this adapter for the last month in a wide variety of homes, hotels, airports, libraries, and apartments all over the UK. Solid performance and really nice to have two USB connections in addition to electric. It never heated up or failed to work. The onlt thing is I wished the blue light wasn't so bright, but it was a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Gardyloo

customer_reviews.title: An adapter for all your travel needs
customer_reviews.text: I have already travelled with this adapter in the UK for a week and love it. It handles all my needs, computer, phone, and even my sleep machine! You will not need anything else once you have this. A fantastic device which is definitely worth the money. Why haven't I seen a product like this before? This device will work anywhere in the world as it has prongs for US, UK and European plugs all built in! Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work for Long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in 2018 before a trip to Europe. It worked very well for my two-week trip. I appreciate the bright blue color (so you don't forget it) and the two USB charging ports. It was easy to use and comes with a carrying pouch. However, I used it again this year for another trip to Europe, and it wouldn't charge anything. The light would briefly turn bright blue (charging) then dim to almost nothing. I tried it in 3 different hotels with the same results, then at home in the U.S., and it doesn't work anymore. Something that only works for a few weeks isn't worth the money. Disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase - Highly Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Still Using The First One I Bought - Four Trips to Europe over Two Years and Use This Everyday on my Trips and at home stateside Too! Love the amount of usb outlets. Lovely Blue Color. Well Constructed. Like the fact they include an Extra fuze and a carrying bag. Second piece ordered was a honey moon gift for a co-worker she same they don’t know what they would have done without it.
customer_reviews.author: JSAKRN79

customer_reviews.title: Excellent adapter
customer_reviews.text: This is the second adapter I bought. The first one I have had for about a year and abused extensively while traveling through Europe and Asia and continues to work flawlessly. I recently bought a second one for my sister who is going to be traveling to Italy. Excellent adapter with multiple features, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN M

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy Adapter.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy adapter for all sorts of travel situations. I have only used the UK/Ireland setting so far, but that worked very well. I really like the fact that it has 2 USB ports as well. I also like that it comes with a small bag to carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: MsDemeanor

customer_reviews.title: Why Waste Money ??
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone ( Me ) purchase adapter over a converter ?? I completely know the difference , enter wife who plugs hair-dryer into the Adapter and blows internal fuses withing 3 hours of landing . Do yourself a favor just buy the converter ....
customer_reviews.author: R.J. Dell

customer_reviews.title: Great and useful little object
customer_reviews.text: Turns out I didn't need this for Japan at all, but I'll be bringing it with me to Europe in a few weeks. It's a useful object even if you only use it for a usb charger, though. I like the satiny texture - it's aesthetically pleasing in addition to being functional. Comes with a fitted pouch. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rebis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used my Porsche-ela adaptor block on trips to SE Asia, Peru, Equador, Baltic Countries, Iceland and Europe. It has worked very well and is compact for ease of travel, much easier than a handful of various adapters. I just bought two more for friends with whom I have traveled. It is well priced, convenient to use and has been delivered expeditiously for both of my orders.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: European Plug Prong Defect
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a month while traveling through Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda and Netherlands. It worked ok in Africa although it was loose and wanted to fall out of the outlet. However, the first time I used the Europe plug adapter in the Netherlands, the plug prongs bent and made the adapter useless for a European outlet. When I got home, I was outside of the return window so couldn't return it. I wouldn't purchase this again because of the European plug prong deficiency and low quality.
customer_reviews.author: coloradoathlete

customer_reviews.title: Died after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Stupid thing died right in the middle of my trip. I almost had to go out with an afro, but my BF was able to find one so I could use my flat iron and be seen in public.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute purchase for our trip to China - Beijing, Xian and Guangzhou . This purchase was on our to do action list that was actually tackled right before we departed. I read the reviews and was very impressed, which lead to our purchase - and we were not disappointed..! Very easy to use and appreciated the 2 USB chargers which allowed my wife and I to recharge our cell phones each night. Great product and strongly recommend - at least for our China travels.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Travel with this constantly
customer_reviews.text: I travel with this constantly and it has worked in 15+ countries so far
customer_reviews.author: bdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. We used this adapter traveling to France, England, Ireland, Nothern Ireland, and Iceland. Very convienent and reliable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used in the UK and it was great. She used it for about a month straight it still looks brand new. It's also very pretty blue. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Works in Switzerland for US accessories
customer_reviews.text: I am using it in Switzerland right now and it works great with my flat iron for my hair and my mobile phone. It has a blue LED light which is a nice night light in the bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Works in Argentina
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the adapter for a trip to South America and it worked fine in Argentina (I didn't need for it for my other destinations) . I was able to charge two devices with the USB jacks at the same time. I didn't have a need to try the other sockets. It is a clever device which appears to allow use with various socket types.
customer_reviews.author: LouDC

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I pictured when purchasing. It shipped in record time and it charges very well. I would definitely recommend it! Great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Klo

customer_reviews.title: Compact and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This worked great in Asia - compact - a little tricky at first - but I figured it out - saves having to bring a bunch of different plugs
customer_reviews.author: yeahyeahyeah

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Took it to Europe - UL and the Continent. Works like a charm. A bit bulky, but overlook it, as it works.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzzmike

customer_reviews.title: Good, but get the better one.
customer_reviews.text: There's a slightly better model they make that has a US Outlet thingy. Would have gotten that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It WORKED!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use this during our trip to Italy. Worked very well. It charged my phone and the portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked All Throughout Europe
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Belgium, France, Germany, Czech Republic, Austria, and Iceland and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Saudade Alike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for several trips overseas, mainly to Europe and it is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Book fan

customer_reviews.title: I hope the size can smaller
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and very good contact. Just size a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kanes X. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Plug and USB
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on trip to UK, no issues apart from it does get very hot. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: I know this will be most useful in my travel in Europe.
customer_reviews.text: The product that I ordered arrived in a timely fashion. It was exactly what I was looking for and it was exactly as you described it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Judy Walden

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on my trip to Greece. Used it for the more important items- my HP chromebook and my hair irons
customer_reviews.author: Lovely RN

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Compact and useful. Only drawback is that plugging in something heavy will pull the prongs out of the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Used on a trip to Athens and Santorini. Worked like charm with the USB plugs for my iPad and iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: paperbackvacation

customer_reviews.title: Travel converter/adaptor
customer_reviews.text: The best travel converter adapter ever made. The customer service, indeed amazing. Thanks very much!!
customer_reviews.author: V i P

customer_reviews.title: Works,  no parts to lose
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Worked well in Germany and Austria. Ordered a second one for use in UK when at school this year
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our trip to London and Paris. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chase the Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I took this on my European vacation and I wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I took this on my European vacation and I wouldn't leave home without it. It is durable and worked everywhere that I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Used this while in Europe and it worked great! Never lost its fuse. Perfect adapter and will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to use the USB charging ports - they save you taking up a plug outlet
customer_reviews.text: Love it because it covers everywhere in a simpler cube.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Valente

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and budget friendly but cheaply made. Part of it broke while on my trip on the first week but was still able to use it. All and all if you don’t want to pay a lot it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cilly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction, no issues as of yet. Got one for my brother, who loved it. So I bought one for myself as well. Extra circuit breaker included is an appreciated touch as well! Sometimes its easy to forget international voltages aren't all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Gio

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. I used it while overseas.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Electrifying
customer_reviews.text: We are traveling in Lisbon now and it is working great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... -- just took it to Spain and it worked Great -- France
customer_reviews.text: functionality and portability -- just took it to Spain and it worked Great -- France, UK, Turkey and Thailand next -- thanks
customer_reviews.author: Warren Weld

customer_reviews.title: Used both USB ports - very convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used it successfully in hotels in France, Spain, and Portugal. Have not had the opportunity for any other countries. Used both USB ports - very convenient and easy to use. Only had this for a few weeks, so cannot comment on longevity, though it appears very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to use and extra fuse is an added layer of security.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased. Lent one to my mom whomloved it so much that I let her keep it. Easy to use and well made.
customer_reviews.author: P. CHANG

customer_reviews.title: Works well as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The multiple ports allow charging of several devices at once, which is a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Collin J Hite

customer_reviews.title: So convenient. Didn't have to worry about whether I ...
customer_reviews.text: So convenient. Didn't have to worry about whether I had the right adaptor--just threw it in my bag, knowing it would cover all the bases.
customer_reviews.author: Irving Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Blew after 2 weeks of using it in Bali. But used it everyday prior to that.
customer_reviews.author: Danya Castro

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, loved the ability to plug in both usb cords as well as standard items at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I only ended up using the general EU socket, but it worked well, and had a light to show me that it was working. I mainly used the USB portion, rather than plugging the cord in. All in all, it worked exactly as specified, for 14 days straight.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Ceja

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in Ireland, and high power a bonus
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, charging iPhones in Ireland (UK electrical system). Extra bonus is usefulness as a high-power (2400mA) USB charger at home in the U.S., great for my old iPad.
customer_reviews.author: D. Preston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, worked great in UK. Very compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. we travel in europe. works really good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Dietrich & Gabriela Pechova

customer_reviews.title: Great item for traveling overseas!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! I highly recommend it to anyone who travels overseas!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Motamedi

customer_reviews.title: so i am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did not travel yet, but it work in the US, so i am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janice P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the small size, easy to pack in my carry on bag
customer_reviews.author: Kerry F.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I traveled with this to Europe. After working for the first few it stopped supplying power. After I came back to the U.S. it still was not working.
customer_reviews.author: Ayden

customer_reviews.title: Very good Universal Travel Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for a Traveller. I like all the options of the adapter compartments.
customer_reviews.author: MAGANIZO KRUGER NYASULU

customer_reviews.title: seems fine - tried it here with the U
customer_reviews.text: seems fine - tried it here with the U.S. plug and worked fine. We'll see how it works in another country.
customer_reviews.author: music lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Adapter!
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to Europe and the UK, and this was very handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Akakpo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well designed, easy to understand and use! Very affordable, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Hello, This product works as advertised. Simple easy to use and it works. Bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjayan Vinayagamoorthy

customer_reviews.title: All Good
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and I like the clean aesthetic and the light that indicated current is running. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Luong

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and convenient--for both USB and electrical plugs.
customer_reviews.text: The travel adapter worked perfectly on our trip to Amsterdam. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in Denmark, Germany and Prague. I loved that you only need to bring your usb cord to charge phone and I pad.
customer_reviews.author: julia capozzoli

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my daughter for her European trip and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Ramonita  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good product. It didn't fry my laptop which I was worried about after I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great while I was in Europe was able to charge multiple things at once.
customer_reviews.author: Badmoonrisin

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: I am using it right now in italy. Works excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these adapters. Well designed and worked superbly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Samuel C Pace

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/10 - the company saw my review, refunded my money, and sent a new one. Because of the outstanding customer service, I am changing my rating to 4 stars. I bought this for a trip to Europe. Used it for almost 2 weeks. Accidentally bumped it while plugged in & the tiny piece of plastic broke that held the prongs in. Now it doesn’t work. Great idea but not durable for travel
customer_reviews.author: P. Schwerdtfeger

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertized
customer_reviews.text: The look and shape of the adapter are nice but after two uses only the black plastic end got stuck ( uk plug) something got broken inside as i could hear a loose thing inside . really disapointed. ● UPDATE: Pors-ela offered me a replacement or full refund, issue solved
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adapter quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Adapter was good for Europe, but the US/UK sides cane bent and won’t fully come out... had those sides worked would be a 5 star product. Really disappointed, thought it would be a good product for trips to places other than just Europe :)
customer_reviews.author: Diana Umana

product_meta.title: PORS-ELA International Power Adapter, Blue
product_meta.description: FIRST TIME IN A NEW COUNTRY? Sure would have been nice if someone had told you that not everyone uses the same power outlet that we have here in the states… HERE’S YOUR SOLUTION PORS-ELA’s Universal Travel Adapter is your answer to those power woes abroad! With superior compatibility at your fingertips, no matter where you are you can charge your devices and stay connected anytime! BUILT BETTER From our plugs to our design, we are one of the very best adapters on the market today. Offering you a truly durable polycarbonate shell with a reliable “no fry” fuse system, you’ll get only the very best from PORS-ELA. GUARANTEED Best of all, your purchase is stress and risk free! We offer a full lifetime guarantee on every adapter that we sell. If it doesn’t perform the way you need it to, you only have to let us know and we’ll make it right. POWER UP TODAY NO MATTER WHERE YOU ARE AND CLICK THE “ADD TO CART” BUTTON NOW!!
feature_bullets: VERSATILE PLUG OPTIONS - UK (Type G), US (Type A), AU (Type I) , EU (Type C/E/F) plugs compatible with outlets in North America, United Kingdom, most of Europe, Australia, Japan, parts of Africa, Middle East, Asia, China, and more!

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY - Whether it’s the wall plugs, or integrated dual USB charger, we’ve got the device for you! With compatibility ranging from smartphone, tablet, and laptop to Bluetooth speaker, power bank, GPS, camera, and more!
ULTRA COMPACT - Sleek design takes so less space to pack without worrying that the prongs will break off or damage anything in your bag.
LIGHT & STURDY - It fits tight and stays fully engaged in the outlet without any falling or bad electrical connection. Good for home and office too!
NOT A CONVERTER - It does NOT convert/transform voltages. It does NOT work with high power appliance such as hair dryer, curler, straightener, flat iron, steam iron, coffee machine, kettle, etc.
